about_conf.title: UXPH Conference 2020
about_conf.body: This year we invite you to The UXPH 2020 Conference: Growth Beyond Borders, a fully online conference made to bring together hundreds of experience designers, enthusiasts, and problem-solvers of all levels, from all over the map. This 2-day event features keynotes, panels, and workshops from local and international design leaders, as well as social gatherings with the Filipino UX design community.

figures.body: professional speakers from all over the world
attendees from each and every conference held
Not some kind of cult (UX be with you!)
